property.name: cn.enjoy.huster.ompi.preinstall
property.description: whether Huster has been pre-installed in YARN cluster nodes, value = {true, false}. If true, please set the following configuration {com.greenplum.huster.home}, and the $HAMSTER_HOME will set to {com.greenplum.huster.home} when launching AMs. If false, please set the following configuration {com.greenplum.huster.tarball.path}, with which, the Huster binaries tarball will be uploaded to staging area and set $HAMSTER_HOME to ./ for AM.

property.name: cn.enjoy.huster.ompi.home
property.description: the dir path of Huster which has been pre-installed in *YARN NM*. Make sure to set it when {com.greenplum.huster.preinstall} is set to *true*

property.name: cn.enjoy.huster.tarball.path
property.description: the local directory of huster tarball, e.g., /Users/hadoop/huster2/huster2.tar.gz; make sure to set it when {com.greenplum.huster.preinstall} is set to *false*.

property.name: cn.enjoy.huster.enabled.logkeys
property.description: which log file will be show to user after a job is finished, split by "," e.g. "stdout", "stdout,stderr", "stderr,syslog". If you leave it blank, we will use default strategy print log out.

property.name: cn.enjoy.huster.hdfs.dir
property.description: the default dir in HDFS for Huster job to upload files. by default, we will put it in hdfs:user-home/huster
